resources.string: You\'re so close to obtaining your first badge!
For every three badges, you\'ll obtain a completed section of your collectible, keep going to obtain all sides!
A collectible is what you want to obtain your collection!

Welcome home! With the home screen, you can step back to the beginning You can filter the content specific for your overall intelligence pleasure. Explore what you want, when you want with no interruptions. Have a change of mind? Not a problem …
Welcome to Sweet Seeds! Here you\'ll tap into your 9 types of multiple intelligences! Let\'s get a move on to see what we\'ve got in store for you…

Terni Lapilli is a game that was popular in Ancient Rome. It is very similar to modern tic-tac-toe, but it has some key differences that make it a different game. The objective for this game is to use your game pieces to score 3 in row.
